c74object.name: dict.joiner
c74object.digest: Merge the content of two dictionaries
c74object.description: Merge the content of two dictionaries.

objarg.name: dictionary-syntax
objarg.digest: Define an initial dictionary for joining
objarg.description: Define an initial dictionary for joining.

method.name: dictionary
method.digest: Dictionary from the second inlet is combined with the dictionary from the first inlet and a new dictionary is sent
method.description: Dictionary from the second inlet is combined with the dictionary from the first inlet and a new dictionary is sent

method.name: bang
method.digest: Resend the most recently combined dictionary
method.description: Resend the most recently combined dictionary
